name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: JSON Viewer - Visualize into interactive graphs

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visualize JSON data with the JSON Viewer Extension! Explore structures in a dynamic graph, with zoom, pan, and export features

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
View JSON data in an easy to read format with JSON viewer extension

JSON Viewer Extension for Chrome which allows you to view JSON in a more user-friendly format. Need to understand and structure hundreds of lines of JSON data, or simply want to make sense of the responses from an API you are working with â€” this extension is perfect for almost any type of JSON data familiarization.

Key Features:

Graph Visualization: Fetch JSON data from the active URL and generate dynamic, interactive graph visualizations to easily understand complex structures..

Zoom In/Out: Easily zoom in and out of graph visualizations to analyze your data from high level to low.

Quick Access via Context Menu: Select a JSON object, right-click to open the context menu, and then click this extension for seamless interaction.

Search JSON Graphically : Searching through large JSON datasets can be overwhelming, but with our graphical search feature, you can easily locate specific keys or values in the graph. The search results will be highlighted within the graph, making it easier to navigate and understand the data

Export as Image: once you're satisfied with the visual representation, Export your visualized graph as an image for easy sharing and offline use.


Simplify your JSON data exploration and visualization with this powerful extension!
